title: PERF-003: Fix Lock Contention in Audio Callback
description: CRITICAL: Real-time audio callback in AudioCaptureService.cs:229-242 acquires lock causing audio dropouts and latency. Replace lock-based buffer writing with lock-free circular buffer or ConcurrentQueue for audio data.
close_reason: Fixed lock contention in AudioCaptureService.cs OnDataAvailable callback (lines 229-242). Replaced lock-based MemoryStream buffer with lock-free ConcurrentQueue<byte[]> for audio data. The audio callback now uses non-blocking Enqueue() instead of lock-based Write(), eliminating audio dropouts and latency issues in the real-time audio path.

title: ISSUE-002: Hardcoded OpenAI API Endpoint URL
description:
DEPLOYMENT ISSUE

The OpenAI API endpoint URL is hardcoded in WhisperService.cs:17:
  private readonly string _baseUrl = "https://api.openai.com/v1/audio/transcriptions";

IMPACT:
- Cannot configure alternative endpoints (Azure OpenAI, proxy servers)
- Enterprise users may require custom endpoints
- No flexibility for API URL changes

FIX:
Move the URL to appsettings.json configuration:
{
  "Transcription": {
    "ApiEndpoint": "https://api.openai.com/v1/audio/transcriptions"
  }
}

Then read from IConfiguration in WhisperService.

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA:
- [ ] Add ApiEndpoint to Transcription config section
- [ ] Update WhisperService to read from config
- [ ] Update appsettings.json with default value
- [ ] Test with both default and custom endpoints
- [ ] Update documentation
